mapper.select: select group_concat(label separator ',') from timeline where del_flag = '0'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timeline( id, pic_id, type, label_id, label, score, reason, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del_flag ) VALUE( #{id}, #{pic.id}, #{type}, #{labelId}, #{label}, #{score}, #{reason}, #{createDate}, #{createUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser.id}, #{delFlag} )
